title: Salesforce Marketing Cloud Developer
description:
Our Engagement Product Development team is growing and we are now looking for a Senior Salesforce Marketing Cloud Developer to join! Engagement at Betsson Group ensures our customers come back for more. It's all about loyalty. We provide a world class customer experience beyond the game play featuring Tournaments, Dynamic personalized campaigns and much more!


**A taster of what you will be involved with:**
-----------------------------------------------


* Act as a consultant and technical expert on the Salesforce platform by providing support to stakeholders and users.
* Closely collaborate with experts from other areas to leverage on the Salesforce technologies through integrations with other solutions.
* Setting up new business units in SFMC that include but not limited to the configuration of the data points and FTP locations.
* Use AMP script to develop dynamic content in SFMC.
* Use SSJS to develop new custom applications in Journey Builder including leveraging the REST & SOAP APIS by creating installed packages.
* Build targeted audience segments based on email behavioral data and CRM attributes using Data Extensions and SQL Setup.
* Leveraging on the capabilities provided by Journey Builder, Automation Studio, Interaction Studio, Content Builder, Email Studio, and other solutions to deliver multi-touch communications.
* Campaigns and Triggered sends: being able to oversee complex campaign workflow rules and data segmentation.
* Oversee the ETL of multiple business units that include suggesting best practices on daily automations.
* Configuring the database environment by creating the data model using data extensions and Contact Builder inside the Data Designer.
* Define data validation, cleansing, deduplication rules and processes in SFMC.
* Define data connectors for data ingestion into Salesforce across Betsson's technical ecosystem, partnering with CRM and Data teams, as needed.
* Assist in the technical and architectural framework for the SFDC applications.
* Ensuring scalability of all the solutions developed.
* Serve as the subject matter expert for SFMC for the internal stakeholders that include managers and end-users.
* As an expert on SFMC, it is expected to gather requirements, discuss, and implement them based on best practices.
* Able to communicate technical and business solutions by developing and presenting information to multiple audiences.

**What we are looking for**
---------------------------


* University degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
* Salesforce Certified Marketing Cloud Developer (or equivalent certification).
* At least 3 years of hands-on experience with Salesforce Marketing Cloud.
* Strong knowledge of Salesforce administration (minimum 1 year).
* Solid understanding of SQL, data modeling, and integration methods.
* Strong documentation and knowledge-sharing mindset.
* Ability to stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and third-party solutions.
* Excellent communication skills with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Experience with JavaScript
* Experience with Salesforce Service Cloud and Sales Cloud is a plus.

**What we offer**
-----------------



We can offer you an environment full of ambition and passion. One day is never like the other as the only constant is change, to the better, to the greater. We strive to be the best in whatever field we choose to play on, and we make sure to have fun along the way!


* A friendly, open and humble working environment, where you will have the chance to work alongside with colleagues from all over the world
* A chance to evolve your skills together with your colleagues with various programs and initiatives
* Personal development through courses, in-house training and external certification


Freedom with responsibility

title: AI Solutions Developer
description:
På Knowit Experience tror vi att de bästa lösningarna föds i mötet mellan teknik, design och människa. Därför söker vi en AI Solutions Developer – en fullstackutvecklare med god erfarenhet av Python, TypeScript och .NET som vill använda sin bredd för att bygga AI-lösningar som är både smarta och användbara.

### **Din vardag hos oss**


Här arbetar du nära kunder och användare för att förstå deras behov. Utifrån det skapar du AI-drivna lösningar som automatiserar processer, förenklar vardagen och öppnar upp nya möjligheter. Du är med i hela resan – från idé och prototyp till färdig produkt – och gillar att hitta kreativa vägar framåt tillsammans med andra.

### **Är det här du?**


Du har erfarenhet av fullstackutveckling och känner dig hemma i Python, TypeScript och .NET


Du trivs i dialogen med kunder eller produktägare och ser helheten


Du har nyfikenhet för AI och brinner för att göra tekniken konkret och användbar


Hos oss blir du en innovationspartner – någon som gör AI begripligt och värdefullt i verkliga projekt.  

  

Vi på Knowit i Malmö söker dig som vill vara med och forma framtiden tillsammans med oss. Hos oss blir du en del av ett nära sammansvetsat team som kombinerar kreativitet med tekniskt kunnande. Här får du möjlighet att:


Utforska AI och bidra till nya lösningar för morgondagen


Utvecklas genom mentorskap, utbildningar och ett starkt nätverk


Arbeta med varierande kunder – från myndigheter till teknikbolag och välkända varumärken


Vara på en arbetsplats som prioriterar öppenhet, hållbarhet och balans i livet


Vår resa börjar i en vision: att bidra till ett mänskligt och hållbart samhälle. Tillsammans med våra kunder har vi i många år byggt lösningar som gör skillnad för både människor och organisationer.


Vi lever efter tre principer:

**Mod** – vi tror på att våga för att kunna förändra

**Transparens** – vi bygger långsiktiga relationer genom ärlighet

**Vi-tänk** – vi strävar efter resultat som gynnar både våra kunder, våra team och samhället i stort


Om du delar våra värderingar och känner igen dig i rollen, vill vi gärna höra från dig!  

Skicka in ditt CV och en kort presentation av dig själv via vår karriärsida (vi tar inte emot ansökningar via e-post).


Har du frågor om tjänsten eller oss?  

Kontakta gärna:  

Carolina Jonsson, People & Culture Knowit Syd – carolina.m.jonsson@knowit.se

title: Front-end utvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**  

* Utveckling och av webbapplikationer med fokus på React.
* Implementering av interaktiva och responsiva användargränssnitt.
* Samarbete med UX-teamet för att säkerställa att designen följs och att användarupplevelsen är optimal.
* Erfarenhet av att integrera och presentera videoströmmar i webbapplikationer är en fördel.
* Arbete med moderna frontend-verktyg och tekniker, inklusive state management, API-integration och testning.

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Flera års erfarenhet av frontend-utveckling med React.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med UX-design i Figma.
* Förmåga att skapa användarvänliga och interaktiva användargränssnitt.
* Erfarenhet av att integrera och presentera videoströmmar i webbapplikationer (fördelaktigt).
* God kommunikationsförmåga och förmåga att arbeta i team.
* Erfarenhet av versionhantering med Git.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med moderna CSS-ramverk.
* Kunskap om testning av frontend-kod.

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 29-09-2025 **Om Deploja**  

  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Backend developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**  

* Several years of experience in backend development using TypeScript/Node.js
* Strong knowledge of databases, particularly PostgreSQL
* Proven experience working in AWS environments
* Hands-on experience processing and managing large datasets
* Background in payments or gaming
* Previous experience with blockchain technology

  

**Application deadline:** 05-09-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: .NET Utvecklare
description:
**Techster Solutions** befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst **4+** års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.

  

Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.

 **Uppdragsbeskrivning**


Vi söker en .Net-utvecklare.


I rollen kommer du kommer att arbeta tillsammans med ett IT-team som levererar en ny plattform för nuvarande och framtida betalningar. Tillsammans med produktspecialister och intressenter kommer du att undersöka, analysera och designa systemlösningar, samt uppskatta tidsåtgång och ansvara för implementering och kvalitetssäkring.

**Kvalifikationer:**

* Du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med .NET och SQL samt ha kunskap inom meddelandeköer som Kafka och IBM MQ.
* Du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med kravhantering, då detta är en av de huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifterna i uppdraget.
* Du bör ha god förståelse för förändringar/uppdateringar av krav och hur dessa påverkar befintliga lösningar.
* Du har förståelse för verksamhet samt erfarenhet av IT-design krävs. Minst 4 års relevant erfarenhet är ett krav.

**Ansökan**  

Tror du att du är **Techster Solutions** nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.

**Arbetsplats och kultur**
--------------------------


Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.


Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Senior Fullstack Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*

title: Senior .NET utvecklare till Stretch Amplify i Malmö
description:
Nu söker vi flera kollegor som vill vara med och bidra till innovativa och effektiva lösningar!


På **Stretch Amplify** höjer vi våra kunders digitala utvecklingsförmåga med både teknik och metodik. Som agil utvecklingspartner hjälper vi våra kunder att ta vara på all den teknik som finns tillgänglig runt omkring oss för att skapa framtidens digitala tjänster och produkter.


Om du motiveras av att arbeta i utmanande projekt med ny teknik och affärsutveckling i tätt samarbete med våra kunder och kollegor så kommer du trivas hos oss!

**Om rollen**


Vi söker en senior utvecklare med en stark drivkraft och hög leveransförmåga. Vi söker dig som har en bred teknisk kompetens och trivs i en roll där du får använda hela din verktygslåda oavsett om du är backend, front-end eller fullstack utvecklare.


Som utvecklare hos oss är du en nyckelspelare i att omvandla affärsbehov till hållbara tekniska lösningar som gör skillnad. Med din nyfikenhet, både för tekniken och för människorna omkring dig, skapar vi tillsammans lösningar som inte bara fungerar idag, utan också är framtidssäkrade.


Som person är du en lagspelare som uppskattar samarbete och ser värdet i att arbeta tätt tillsammans med andra för att skapa framgångsrika leveranser med fokus på kvalitet och affärsvärde. Du är nyfiken, initiativrik och engagerad i att skapa lösningar som bidrar till långsiktigt värde.

**Saker vi vet är viktiga för att lyckas**

* Flera års erfarenhet som utvecklare, med Microsoft som plattform och gärna med erfarenhet av molntjänster som Azure.
* Tidigare erfarenheter av att arbeta i team med agila metoder som Scrum och Kanban.
* Stark förmåga att kommunicera komplexa tekniska lösningar på ett tydligt och inspirerande sätt, både internt och externt.

**Teknik**


Vi vill gärna utforska och experimentera med nya tekniker för att möta framtidens behov med lösningar som gör skillnad och är framåtlutade. Våra utvecklare arbetar med en bred teknisk verktygslåda som kan variera beroende på kund och projekt.


Nedan följer några exempel på teknologier vi ofta använder:

* Utvecklingsspråk och ramverk: C#, .NET, JavaScript-ramverk som React och Vue.
* Molnplattformar: Främst Azure men även AWS.
* DevOps och CI/CD: Bygg- och leveranspipelines med fokus på automatisering.
* Containerteknologier: Docker och Kubernetes för skalbara och portabla lösningar.
* Databaser: Relationsdatabaser som Postgres, MS SQL samt NoSQL databaser.

**Vi erbjuder**

* En flexibel arbetsplats
* Konferenser – digitala, fysiska, interna och externa!
* Arbete i en mix av in-house leveranser och externa leveranser
* Kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling – i nya projekt, team och kunder
* Nära till beslut – dina idéer är värdefulla och de vill vi satsa på!

**Vilka blir dina Stretchkollegor?**


Vi har lite olika bakgrund, men gemensamt är att vi är problemlösare som trivs med komplicerade frågeställningar och utmaningar. Vi vet att mjukvara och produktutveckling är komplext och därför har vi lämnat förlegade arbetssätt bakom oss. Våra gemensamma värdeord är Nyfiken, Omtanke och Resultat – vilket vi exemplifierar i våra uppdrag hos kund såväl som internt.

**Om Stretchgruppen**


Vi tror på alla människors vilja och förmåga att utveckla en bättre värld. Och att vi har ett kollektivt ansvar att skapa hållbara lösningar, för en bättre framtid för oss och kommande generationer. Vi kallar det för hållbart entreprenörskap.


Våra bolag erbjuder IT-tjänster och produkter som skapar starkare och tydligare affärsvärde. Varje bolag har sin egen väldefinierade marknad där kundernas digitalisering står i centrum.


Läs mer oss och våra värderingar på Om Stretchgruppen - Stretch
company_description: Stretch gör skillnad genom att ha affärsvärde i fokus, leveransförmåga i toppklass och entreprenörskap i vårt DNA. Dessutom har vi riktigt roligt när vi jobbar tillsammans. Följ med oss!

title: Android-utvecklare
description:
**Techster Solutions** befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst **3+** års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.

  

Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.

 **Uppdragsbeskrivning**

Vi söker en Android-utvecklare till ett uppdrag.


I denna roll får du arbeta med utveckling av native-appar för olika Android-enheter inom en ledande streamingtjänst. Du blir en del av ett tvärfunktionellt team där fokus ligger på att skapa en förstklassig användarupplevelse, samtidigt som systemen ställer höga krav på stabilitet och säkerhet.


För att lyckas i denna roll trivs du med att samarbeta och värdesätter öppen kommunikation. Du är nyfiken, pragmatisk och bekväm med att arbeta i ett agilt team där man gärna testar nya arbetssätt. Du delar gärna med dig av din kunskap och har en stark vilja att utvecklas både själv och tillsammans med andra.

**Bör-krav:**

* Du har stor samarbetsförmåga och vara inlyssnande
* Du har flera års erfarenhet av Android-utveckling
* Du har goda kunskaper i Kotlin och Jetpack Compose
* Du har erfarenhet av att bygga native Android-appar
* Du är bekantskap med moderna utvecklingsmetoder
* Du är kreativ

**Meriterande:**

* Du har erfarenhet av Android TV, Googles ekosystem (t.ex. Cast, Nest)
* Du har erfarenhet av större medie- eller streamingappar
* Tillgänglighet/inclusive design eller videostreaming
* Du har intresse för att bidra till utveckling av arbetsprocesser
* Du har kunskaper inom reaktiv programmering (t.ex. Flows, Apollo)

**Ansökan**  

Tror du att du är **Techster Solutions** nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.

**Arbetsplats och kultur**
--------------------------


Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.


Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Junior Buyer & Product Developer - Maternity Cover
description:
**Junior Buyer (50% and Product Developer (50%) - Maternity cover (1 year)**
============================================================================

  

At Happy Socks we have made it our mission to spread happiness everywhere, and you only have to spend a few minutes with us to realize how seriously we take it! Our vibrant 'Happy Crew' consists of colorful and creative characters from all over the world (25+ nationalities, and counting!) spread out in our offices in Stockholm, NYC, Munich, Shanghai and Istanbul. Our mission is to spread happiness and color to every corner of the world.


Are you ready to join our colorful crew? Join us as our Junior Buyer and Product Developer!

**What you’ll be doing:**


As Junior Buyer (50%) and Product Developer (50%), you play a key role in the end-to-end process of bringing seasonal collections to life -from early product development through to final delivery, ensuring the products meet quality, cost and timeline targets.


You are responsible for managing supplier relationships, negotiating prices, and securing accurate, on-time deliveries. Simultaneously, you oversee the development of new products, ensuring they align with brand standards, meet compliance requirements, and are produced with the most suitable partners. By maintaining accurate data, driving innovation, and supporting sustainability efforts, this role contributes directly to the brand’s continued growth and product excellence.  



**Junior Buyer key responsibilities:**

* Place and follow up on orders to ensure delivery accuracy, cashflow- and cost optimization throughout the season, verifying all connected data.
* Conduct price negotiations aligned with set margin targets and price development goals.
* Prepare, follow up and manage photo and salesman samples to support seasonal launches.
* Support seasonal capacity planning and article-based forecasting
* Handle supplier invoices, manage claims and coordinate with the internal Finance team on invoice related issues.
* Create buying-related reports for sustainability reporting, audits or internal analysis.
* Ensure accurate and timely delivery of master data from the purchasing team for product related projects.

 **Product Developer key responsibilities:**

* Responsible for the the execution of new collections from sketch to approved sample, adhering to established routines.
* Collaborate on new product line developments, including evaluating initial pricing for new styles and materials.
* Ensure products, labels, artworks, and components meet business standards, timelines, and are sourced from the most appropriate suppliers.
* Maintain accurate specifications and sample comments for efficient handover to suppliers and production team.
* Manage internal/external product testing and ensure compliance with quality requirements.
* Introduce innovative ideas, including exploring new materials and qualities.
* Manage article administration in PLM (Product Lifecycle Management), ensuring master data is accurate and up-to-date.
* Participate in supplier performance evaluations, providing insights on sample precision, quality, service level, and collaboration opportunities.
* Ensure that all product development milestones and deadlines are met according to plan.

 **How**

* You use your analytical mindset to extract data driven insights and share with relevant stakeholders on regular basis
* Keep track of, and follow up on, costs and KPIs related to your suppliers
* Participate in the implementation of cross functional initiatives
* With your happy-get-it-done attitude you don’t hesitate to jump in where you’re needed - from high to low. You know how to handle different types of people and feel comfortable working with different stakeholders and partners. Finally, you are great at problem solving and taking decisions in a fast paced environment

 **Specific experience and knowledge for this role:**

* Academic degree from textile and/ or business education
* Minimum of 4 years' professional experience in similar roles
* Strong communication skills in written and spoken English
* Proficient in MS Office applications, particularly Excel
* Proficient in working in ERP and PLM systems (preferably Business Central and Delogue)
* Fluent in English


This is a full-time, one-year contract position to cover a maternity leave, and we are looking for a candidate to start as soon as possible.

title: Backend developer
description:
We are looking for senior backend engineers to join us and expand our team of talented backend developers. You share a passion for building systems that delivers high business value without sacrificing maintainability, availability, scalability and quality. You will work on the backend systems that power our casino platform and help us deliver the best customer experience.
   

  

**Job Description**
* Design, develop and help operate our systems
* Drive technical improvements throughout the stack
* Together with product teams deliver the best games and business solutions
* Help scale our solution to customer requirements and business opportunities


 Who you are
   

  

* You have 5+ years of experience working in a mixed Java, SQL, Javascript environment
* Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent
* You are passionate about working in an environment of continuous learning
* You are curious, driven and not afraid to take charge and improve the system and add automation where needed
* Taking on technical challenges and solving them is something you take pride in
* You have experience from working on large Java systems and have a solid understanding of performance, scalability and availability challenges of distributed systems
* Quality, not only of the code you write, but the delivered system is important to you
* You thrive in an environment where you are responsible for your code and takes ownership of the change from editor to production system
* You know your way around a modern Unix/Linux system
* Experience with modern deployment, monitoring and logging solutions


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr@nolimitcity.com
   

  

 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Backend Software Engineer
description:
*Nordnet redefined the financial world as the first digital bank in Europe. Now we are about to do it again and the aim is to create the next generation of bank, in the cloud. We know that this requires great people, great teams, and great technology. Do you want to join us and build the new Nordnet?*
**In brief**
 At Nordnet we want to democratize savings and investments by giving our customers access to the best tools and information whether you are a professional investor or a small saver. With modern technologies and speed of delivery, we are building the next generation investment platform.
   

  

**This is part of the role**
 Nordnet is a company with tech as the primary focus. In our agile and autonomous teams, you will be working with engaged colleagues that love to share their knowledge. As a developer at Nordnet, you will have the possibility to make an impact and create value for our customers with continuous releases several times a day.
   

  

**This is you**
 To succeed in this role, we believe that you take great pride in your work, are curious and continuously want to learn and grow. Collaboration and discussing ideas and concepts with your colleagues are things you enjoy and believe are important in order to build great products.
   

  

**As a Backend Software Engineer, You**
* Have experience of modern Java and Spring Boot
* Have experience of cloud development
* Have an interest in infrastructure as code and preferably experience in DevOps
* Design, develop, deploy and run Java services following good design and development practices
* Find the customer's importance and appreciate working closely together within a pure backend team, with stakeholders across the organization as well as outside 3rd-party vendors.
* Are a true team player that likes to share knowledge with your colleagues
* Love to automate, especially when it comes to testing
* Experience in high-performing, low-latency systems are preferred


 In this particular role, we believe you have an interest in savings and investments, and if you have worked in similar areas, it is even better.
   

  

**Nordnetters**
* Are proud of the friendly and humble environment
* Believe that the best code is written together and therefore appreciate pair/mob programming
* Continuously improve to ensure quality, making the code better with every release
* Commit to goals as a team, sharing the responsibility, success and failure


**What We Offer**
* Backend agile team which owns and maintains their product
* Your expertise and contribution will be appreciated from day one
* Plenty of opportunities to grow as an engineer
* Competitive salary and compensation


 We offer you the opportunity to work in a Nordic environment with a strong focus on delivery, product development and technology. Our ambitions are high and you will embark on a fast and challenging journey together with a skillful team of sharp and committed colleagues. Our teams are autonomous and embrace the agile way of working.
   

  

 Culture is built and cared for, each day by everyone. We’re proud of ours. Having a flat organization where anyone can talk to anyone creates a warm and friendly atmosphere worth protecting. We believe in a culture where every effort counts and where everyone is being recognized. A culture embracing our core values – passion, simplicity and transparency on all levels, no matter who you are or what you do.
   

  

 We are over 900 employees in Stockholm, Oslo, Helsinki and Copenhagen.
   

  

 Visit us on: www.nordnetab.com and https://career.nordnetab.com/pages/engineering
   

  

**Questions & applications**
 Apply today – we will start interviewing immediately. Please note that we do only accept applications through our recruitment system, hence no email applications will be considered.
   

  

 We want to inform you that Nordnet conducts mandatory credit and background checks, as well as drug testing as a part of our recruitment process.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!

title: Software Engineer
description:
We're looking for an experience Software Engineer for our client in Central Stockholm.
 



  





 This position offers a flexible hybrid work schedule of 2 days a week in office.
 



  





 You'll be working with an exciting IoT business, developing a cloud-native platform that enables intelligent, secure access to buildings. The software communicates directly with distributed edge devices, empowering commercial clients to manage building access at scale, from anywhere. As an engineer working in a small skilled team, you'll get plenty of variety on projects and take ownership over the areas you're most interested in, whether that be DevOps, Frontend, Security or Cloud.
 



  





**Requirements:-** 



* 4+ years of experience building and maintaining modern software products
* Strong backend development skills in Java and Spring Boot
* Hands-on experience with modern frontend technologies, such as React/Next.js
* Familiarity with cloud infrastructure (AWS) and distributed systems
* Curious about modern development tools and AI-assisted coding workflows
* Fluent English speaker, based in Stockholm



  





**Nice to have:-** 



* Experience working with event-driven architectures or message queues
* Experience with IoT or connected devices.
* Experience in container orchestration with Kubernetes



  





**What's on offer:-** 



* Work in a small, skilled team with direct impact on the product, users, and architecture
* A modern stack and cloud-native architecture
* Flexible hybrid work
* Competitive compensation, ITP Pension and 30 days vacation.

* Continuously improve to ensure quality, making the code better with every release

**What We Offer**
* Fullstack agile team which owns and maintains their product
* Your expertise and contribution will be appreciated from day one
* Plenty of opportunities to grow as an engineer
* Competitive salary and compensation


 We offer you the opportunity to work in a Nordic environment with a strong focus on delivery, product development and technology. Our ambitions are high and you will embark on a fast and challenging journey together with a skillful team of sharp and committed colleagues. Our teams are autonomous and embrace the agile way of working.
   

  

 Culture is built and cared for, each day by everyone. We’re proud of ours. Having a flat organization where anyone can talk to anyone creates a warm and friendly atmosphere worth protecting. We believe in a culture where every effort counts and where everyone is being recognized. A culture embracing our core values – passion, simplicity and transparency on all levels, no matter who you are or what you do.
   

  

 We are over 900 employees in Stockholm, Oslo, Helsinki and Copenhagen.
   

  

 Visit us on: career.nordnetab.com/pages/engineering
   

  

 Learn more about Nordnet in our brand movie This is Nordnet, that describes our identity.
   

  

**Questions & applications**
 Apply today – we will start interviewing immediately. Please note that we do only accept applications through our recruitment system, hence no email applications will be considered.
   

  

 We want to inform you that Nordnet conducts mandatory credit and background checks, as well as drug testing as a part of our recruitment process.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!

title: Backend Software Engineer
description:
We at Umain are looking for
 **Senior Backend Engineers** 
 with a genuine enthusiasm for building robust solutions that power digital experiences — engineers ready to bring passion, creativity, and dedication with them.
   

  

 The role is broad but centered on backend technologies, offering the opportunity to work on a variety of projects for both Swedish and international companies.
   

  

 We work with many different tech stacks, but most of our projects are written in
 **Kotlin, Go, or TypeScript** 
 . Our approach is to use the tools best suited for each project, ensuring our teams are not locked into a single stack.
   

  

**We Have a Proven Track Record**
* 400M+ total app downloads
* 50M+ monthly active users
* Backends handling tens of thousands of requests per second
* Globally recognized, multi-market applications


 If working at scale with technology that truly makes an impact excites you, we believe you'll be a great fit at Umain.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* A chance to work on a range of diverse and unique projects that explore and push the boundaries of what's possible.
* A fun and fair work environment where you have the opportunity to expand your skills through unique challenges and fantastic colleagues.
* A personal coach, and a setting where you can grow professionally and personally.
* Being part of multidisciplinary teams, participating in agile teams, being an important player in a highly ambitious setting.


 As a Senior Backend Developer at Umain, your role will involve:
   

  

* Building high-performance backend systems using modern languages like Go, NodeJS, Python, and Kotlin to power innovative experiences
* Using modern backend frameworks such as Fiber, Ktor, Express and FastAPI to create robust solutions.
* Designing and implementing cloud-native solutions across AWS, GCP and Azure, using Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform) for resource management
* Building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines with containerized deployments and scaling strategies
* Developing robust data models and database architectures to support application requirements
* Participating in projects & teams alongside some of the largest and most forward-thinking brands on the planet


**Who You Are**
* You're a developer with a passion for innovation and a knack for problem-solving.
* You're eager to learn, grow, and take on new challenges.
* You value collaboration, diversity, and the opportunity to make a significant impact.
* You believe in the power of technology to shape the future.


 Why Umain?
   

  

**Career Framework**
 We believe in fairness and clarity, which is why we've established a transparent career framework to ensure equal pay and equal opportunities for all. Your growth and success are as important to us as they are to you. Together with your coach, you will build your own development plan and grow in your career.
   

  

**Work-Life Balance**
 At Umain, diversity is our strength. We understand that life doesn’t pause when you walk into the office. That's why we've cultivated an environment that supports an excellent work-life balance. We welcome team members from all walks of life, recognizing the richness that different backgrounds, ages, and life stages bring to our team. We're committed to supporting each other, encouraging a healthy work-life balance that respects your needs, whether it's taking care of your family, your pets, or yourself.
   

  

**Innovations And Learning**
 Technology is always evolving, bringing new challenges and opportunities for collaboration and learning. Our developers work closely with designers, analysts, testers and more to tackle these challenges head-on, sharing knowledge and growing together.
   

  

**Skills Over Degrees**
 We’re more interested in what you can do than in the diplomas you hold. Talent, drive, and creativity are what count at Umain. Here, you’ll find opportunities to grow, learn, and excel in your career, regardless of your educational background. If you have the ambition and commitment to succeed, we have the environment and resources to support your journey.
   

  

 Are you ready to SHAPE, SHIP, and SCALE with us?
   

  

 If you're a developer who thrives on innovation, values a supportive and inclusive workplace, and is eager to make a tangible impact on the future, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s build something awesome together.
   

  

 Umain is a digital product consultancy. We shape, ship and scale digital products at speed. Founded in Stockholm in 2001, we are a growing team of 100+ experts in digital product strategy, design, and technology.
   

  

 We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.

title: Engagement - Frontend Software Engineer
description:
Our Engagement Product Development team is growing and we are now looking for a Frontend Software Engineer to join! Engagement at Betsson Group ensures our customers come back for more. It’s all about loyalty. We provide a world class customer experience beyond the game play featuring Tournaments, Dynamic personalized campaigns and much more!
 



  
 


**A taster of what you will be involved with** 

 We want to be pioneers in a highly competitive market so we continuously strive for technical and product excellence. As part of our team, you will be building new products using latest technologies; actively contributing towards our multi-brand adaptive frontend platform, which is supporting our core brands.
 



 Our Frontend stack includes Angular 16, Angular Material (Desktop), TypeScript 4, Redux Pattern for State Management, RxJS, Sass, HTML5; and the frontend consumes RESTful APIs and Web Sockets. It’s a plus if you are curious about creating reusable custom web components, utilising libraries such as StencilJS.
 



 As a Frontend Developer, you will be part of a cross functional team within our Engagement area. You will be contributing directly to the success of our products by materializing our product teams' visions into a tangible user experience. You will participate in agile rituals such as planning, estimation, development, testing, code reviews, deploying great software, implementing new features as well as maintaining and improving the existing functionality.
   

  




**You are good at** 
* TypeScript and JavaScript
* At least one JavaScript Framework (Angular 7+, AngularJS, React+Redux, or Vue.js)
* HTML, CSS, Sass or LESS
* RESTful APIs
* Understanding of micro-frontend architecture
* Unit and Integration Tests (Jasmine, Jest, Karma)
* JavaScript tooling (webpack, rollup.js)
* Scalable and performant web applications
* Agile product development



  
 


**What we offer** 

 We can offer you an environment full of ambition and passion. One day is never like the other as the only constant is change, to the better, to the greater. We strive to be the best in whatever field we choose to play on, and we make sure to have fun along the way!
 


* A friendly, open and humble working environment, where you will have the chance to work alongside with colleagues from all over the world
* A chance to evolve your skills together with your colleagues with various programs and initiatives
* Personal development through courses, in-house training and external certification
* Freedom with responsibility



  
 



  
 


 Challenge accepted?
 
***By submitting your application, you understand that your personal data will be processed as set out in our Privacy Policy***

title: Frontend Developer
description:
Digital Lending consists of several cross-functional agile teams that design, build and maintain Lending products in digital customer channels (internet bank, mobile bank) for bank customers in Sweden.

 Design, develop, deploy & maintain Lending products in Internet Bank

title: Fullstack utvecklare
description:
**Om Vimla!** 




 Är du en nyfiken fullstack-utvecklare som vill jobba i en teknikdriven miljö och göra skillnad för hundratusentals aktiva användare? Vimla är mobiloperatören, som genom att vara en fristående del av Telenor, kombinerar kraften från en stor organisation med friheten och flexibiliteten i ett litet team. Vi står för att ta kundfokus, enkelhet och schyssthet till en ny nivå på mobilmarknaden och i vårt team. Vi vill att det ska vara enkelt och roligt att vara kund så väl som medarbetare hos oss!
 







 Nu har du chansen att joina teamet i rollen som Senior fullstack utvecklare, ta chansen och sök!
 








**Vad du kommer att göra** 




 I rollen som Senior Fullstack utvecklare på Vimla kommer du in i en scale-up miljö där du tillsammans med ditt team arbetar i syfte att utveckla och underhålla Vimlas tekniska miljö. Ni står i centrum för att bygga de tekniska förutsättningarna för en helt digital mobiloperatör. Du arbetar tillsammans med ett tight team av utvecklare med passion för teknik och bra stämning. Teamet består av såväl juniora som mer seniora kollegor, vilket medför en kultur av lärande och kunskapsdelning.
 







 Inom ramen för rollen kommer du
 


* Bygga och optimera våra API:er
* Förbättra vår CI/CD-pipeline
* Utveckla nya tjänster i vår digitala plattform
* Jobba med skalbarhet i vår molnbaserade miljö







 Hos oss får du möjlighet att utmanas, utveckla din kompetens och arbeta med fantastiska och kompetenta kollegor. Om du gillar att ha en möjlighet att påverka vad du jobbar med, en bredd i dina arbetsuppgifter och jobba i ett tight DevOps-team - det här är platsen för dig!
 







**Vi söker dig som** 









 Vi ser att du har minst tre års tidigare erfarenheter av utveckling inom Typescript, node backends samt react för frontend. Du har fokus på leverans och säkerställer alltid god kvalitet i slutresultatet och tror att du tidigare har erfarenhet från att designa, bygga och underhålla distribuerade system i en molnbaserad miljö (tex AWS). Vi förutsätter att du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska.
 







 Tech-stack du jobbar med:
 


* Frontend: React, TypeScript, Redux, Jest, Playwright & React Native
* Backend: Node.js, API-utveckling
* Databas: PostgreSQL
* Arbetssätt: Agilt, DevOps, testdriven utveckling (TDD)



  





 Meriterande:
 


* Svelte
* Nginx, shell-scripting (Bash, Nushell)
* QA-arbete
* DevOps & Infrastruktur: Docker, Kubernetes/Docker Swarm, AWS, CI/CD med GitHub Actions



  





 På Vimla så värdesätter vi individer som är angelägna om att lära sig och utveckla sin egen kompetens. Vi förväntar oss inte att du känner till alla teknologier i vår stack, så vi letar främst efter någon med ett tillväxttänk och en vilja att lära sig!
 







**Varför du vill jobba på Vimla** 




 Vimla är på en spännande tillväxtresa och möjligheterna att växa och utvecklas tillsammans med oss är enorma. Vi är ett roligt, tight team på runt 40 personer i en egen organisation som har stor frihet. Samtidigt är Vimla en del av Telenor Sverige och använder tryggheten som finns i ett stort bolag.
 







**Bra att veta** 




 I den här rekryteringen samarbetar Vimla/Telenor med Experis IT, som har lång erfarenhet av att rekrytera IT-specialister och chefer.
 







 Om du har frågor eller vill ha mer information är du välkommen att kontakta rekryteringskonsulterna Anki Snis på
 **anki.snis@se.experis.com** 
 , +46 70-377 59 69, och Carina Eyoma på
 **carina.eyoma@se.experis.com** 
 , +46 73-086 22 75.
 



  





 Urval sker löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.
 







 Vi ser fram emot att ta del av din ansökan!
 



  





 I enlighet med Telenors policy genomför vi en bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidater i alla rekryteringar.
 



  





 Plats: Stockholm Råsunda

title: Software Engineer
description:
Are you ready to take the next step in your career as a Java Developer? We are looking for skilled developers to join our agile teams in Stockholm, working on long-term projects that deliver real social value and technical innovation.
 



  





 This is a permanent opportunity within a highly collaborative environment, where knowledge sharing, growth, and cutting-edge technology are at the heart of the culture.
 



  





**What you’ll do** 




  




* Develop and maintain modern applications using
 **Java and Spring Boot**
* Contribute to long-term, impactful projects in sectors such as health, energy, and the public domain
* Work closely with cross-functional teams in an agile setup

**Must-have skills:** 




  




* 5–8 years of Java development experience
* Strong background in Spring Boot

 Why join?

* Work in an environment that encourages growth, experimentation, and career progression

title: Founding Software Engineer
company_industry: Software Development and Services for Renewable Energy
description:
We're recruiting a Founding Software Engineer for our client in central Stockholm!
 



  





**The Position** 




 You'll be joining a venture-backed start-up operating in the industrial energy space. The mission is to help energy-intensive businesses adapt in real time to reduce costs, cut carbon, and respond to volatile grid conditions. The product connects directly with physical infrastructure, optimising energy usage through AI-driven forecasting and control.
 



  





 As a Founding Software Engineer, you'll be instrumental player in building the company's platform and design, develop and maintain scalable and high-performance distributed systems. Some of the initial projects will involve building their control plane, API layer and working across most of the stack - Backend, Data, Cloud.
 



  





**Requirements** 



* 6+ years of production-level experience in owning, building, delivering, and maintaining large distributed systems at scale.
* Strong programming skills in Golang
* Experience with infrastructures and cloud providers such AWS or GCP.
* Proficiency building and managing databases in PostgreSQL
* Deep understanding of multi-threading, concurrency and parallel processing technologies.
* Adhere to engineering best practices.
* Fluent English Speaker



  





**Bonus** 



* Worked on physical/digital systems (IoT, robotics, embedded, etc.)
* Experience in start-ups or as a Founding engineer.



  





**What's on offer** 



* Competitive salary and Stock option package
* Working with some of the most prominent entrepreneurs and investors in the industry
* Solve real-world problems with direct energy and climate impact
* Build cutting-edge ML systems in a team that values speed, autonomy, and results

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
**Expleo** 
 is seeking a highly skilled and experienced
 **Fullstack Developer** 
 to join our team in
 **Sweden** 
 (located in Gothenburg OR Stockholm).
   

  

 Our
 **ideal** 
 candidate has an always-on mindset with a strong background in designing, configuring, and managing solutions for devices, tools, and applications in a factory/corporate setting.
   

  

 If you are a full-stack engineer looking to expand your skill set, we'd love to hear from you. Join our team today and take the next step in your career!
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Understand and reflect on the customer needs to bring value to the organization.
* Take part in the development cycle using innovative technologies and frameworks.
* Secure qualitative, efficient and performance deliveries.
* Provide input for the design and construction of test cases and scenarios and help validate executed test results.
* Contribute to boosting the team to continually increase knowledge, competence, performance, and innovation
* Collaborate with suppliers, architects, engineers, developers, and internal stakeholders on upcoming and innovative technologies and standardization.
* Collaborate with the local IT site teams for problem/opportunity analysis.


**Qualifications**
* Hold a bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science or equivalent experience in a relevant field.
* Knowledge and experience in agile development practices, ITIL (incident, problem & change process), collaboration tools (such as Azure DevOps or similar)
* Java development & support, relational databases (Oracle, SQL server, My SQL).
* Eager to learn and grow (yourself and the company) using a modern approach to Software Engineering.
* Ability to work under rapidly changing conditions and have the capability to identify, mitigate and decide on solutions when facing obstacles.
* You are fluent in English, both verbally and written.
* You should have a general understanding of production processes and understand how all these things work together to make end user applications work well.
* Knowledge of the automotive industry is meritorious.


**Experience**
* Knowledge about databases (MS SQL (Azure))
* Development platforms (Java, OpenShift, ...)
* Azure Cloud (App services, AKS Azure Kubernetes Cluster)
* SQL server for database
* Azure Storage, Azure Container Services
* Frameworks (Spring, Springboot, WebFlux, ...)
* Messaging (MQ, Kafka, REST API, ...)
* Front-end (Angular)
* Test Driven Development (Unit testing in Spring Boot and Angular, in memory database testing using Mockito)
* Agile processes (Safe / Scrum / ADO) but also about backlog management, strategic planning, business relationship management, problem analysis and business modelling.
* Bonus points for having relevant experience using docker containers and orchestration with Kubernetes.


**Benefits**
**Who are we?**
 Expleo is a rapidly growing consulting company dedicated to delivering innovative solutions in the fields of AI engineering, digitalization, hyper-automation, cybersecurity, and data science. With a strong commitment to integrity, diversity, sustainability, and societal security, Expleo is at the forefront of creating a better future. Join our dynamic team and be part of our journey to shape the future of technology and business.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
* Collaborative working environment – we stand shoulder to shoulder with our clients and our peers through good times and challenges
* We empower all passionate technology loving professionals by allowing them to expand their skills and take part in inspiring projects
* Expleo Academy - enables you to acquire and develop the right skills by delivering a suite of accredited training courses
* Always working as one team, our people are not afraid to think big and challenge the status quo
* Collective agreement with the union
* Access to a collection of benefits and discounted prices on services and shops.
* Health benefits
* Expleo team activities


 "We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age ”.

title: Senior Fullstack Web3 Developer (On-site)
description:
*Nibiru is revolutionizing gaming through blockchain and decentralized ownership. Our flagship, Planet IX, is a leading DeFi play-to-earn strategy game with a vibrant metaverse. With a growing global community, especially in Asia, and exciting partnerships, we’re expanding to Base with new AI-driven mechanics and tokenomics. Join our Stockholm team to shape the future of Web3 gaming!* 




  





**The Role** 




 As a Senior Fullstack Web3 Developer, you’ll drive the evolution of Planet IX by building and optimizing smart contracts, developing innovative game features, and integrating AI-driven mechanics to enhance player experiences. You’ll work across backend (Node.js, MySQL, Elastic), frontend (TypeScript, Vue.js/Next.js), and Web3 technologies (Solidity, Chainlink, Hardhat) to create seamless gameplay and dynamic tokenomics. With our global community at the heart of Planet IX, you’ll collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver player-centric solutions, thriving in a fast-paced environment where you balance independent problem-solving with teamwork.
 



  





**What we seek** 



* Strong fullstack development skills in backend (Node.js, MySQL, Elastic) and frontend (TypeScript, Vue.js/Next.js).
* Extensive experience in Solidity, coding secure, gas-optimized smart contracts for critical systems.
* Proficiency with Web3 tools (e.g., Hardhat, OpenZeppelin, Chainlink Automation/VRF/CCIP, Chai, Mocha).
* Deep understanding of DeFi and its users, with a passion for gaming and blockchain innovation.
* Experience analyzing blockchain data and integrating blockchain services for product and user experience improvements.
* Familiarity with Python, Google BigQuery, or Footprint (nice-to-have).
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts clearly to diverse stakeholders.
* Business-driven mindset, delivering value through productive and engaging teamwork.



  





**What you get** 




 Join a passionate team at the forefront of Web3 gaming, shaping Planet IX and its global community. You’ll work in a fast-changing environment, grow your expertise in DeFi and tokenomics, and collaborate in a modern, vibrant office on Södermalm, Stockholm. Enjoy 30 days of vacation, a wellness allowance, competitive pension and insurance packages, and regular after-work events. Be part of an exciting journey where your work delivers impact and innovation every day!
 



  





**Working location** 




 On-site in our modern office on Södermalm, Stockholm, where you’ll thrive in a collaborative, creative environment alongside passionate teammates. Our vibrant location fosters innovation and teamwork, perfect for building the future of Web3 gaming.
 



  





**How to apply** 




 Excited to shape the future of Web3 gaming with Planet IX? Send your CV and a cover letter via LinkedIn Easy Apply or email to alberto.chavez-perez@nibiru.se. Applications are reviewed on a rolling basis, so apply today to join our mission!

title: Dotnet Developer
description:
Job Title: Senior Application Developer (Senior .Net Developer)
 



 Location: Stockholm, Sweden (3 Days to Office every Week)

title: Senior PHP Developer
company_industry: Internet Marketplace Platforms, Technology, Information and Internet, and Information Services
description:
**We're not just building an ecommerce platform — we’re reshaping how fashion & lifestyle brands scale globally.**
 Our API-first, headless SaaS platform supports over
 **300 brands** 
 in delivering localized, high-performance shopping experiences across
 **120+ countries** 
 . Backed by a
 **50 million SEK investment** 
 from the
 **H&M Group** 
 , we power leading names like
 **COS** 
 ,
 **ARKET** 
 ,
 **& Other Stories** 
 ,
 **Weekday** 
 ,
 **Nudie Jeans** 
 , and
 **Paul Smith** 
 . Brands like
 **Holzweiler** 
 trust Centra to run operations in
 **20+ markets** 
 with small, efficient teams—a reflection of the platform’s flexibility and efficiency.
   

  

 Why join Centra?
   

  

**Building meaningful solutions**
 Here, developers are deeply involved in solving real business challenges—not just writing code. You’ll work closely with cross-functional teams to build solutions that directly impact the success of internationally recognized brands.
   

  

**Engineering that challenges and inspires**
 You’ll tackle performance-critical systems, apply domain-driven design and use modern architecture patterns. Whether it’s designing a GraphQL API, or optimizing cross-border flows, your contributions will have both technical depth and business relevance. You’ll take real ownership of your work and help shape technical direction.
   

  

**Growth beyond Senior**
 Our engineers’ development doesn't stop at “senior.” We support continued progress through both technical mastery and leadership opportunities—whether you want to deepen your expertise, shape architecture, mentor others, or lead teams. You’ll have the freedom and support to advance in the direction that suits you best.
   

  

 What you'll do
   

  

 As a Senior PHP Developer, you'll help shape Centra’s platform—designing robust, efficient systems alongside product and design teams. You’ll write clean code, contribute to reviews, mentor peers, and help refine the way we build.
   

  

 We work in cross-functional teams with a focus on fast feedback, clear communication, and minimal bureaucracy.
   

  

 What we’re looking for
   

  

* Strong experience with modern PHP and software engineering best practices
* Passion for performance, clean code, and technical excellence
* A problem-solving mindset and sharp attention to detail
* Collaborative spirit and strong communication skills, with fluency in English


 Our tech-stack
   

  

* Languages: PHP 8.3, Golang, TypeScript
* Databases: MySQL, ElasticSearch, Redis
* Infrastructure: AWS, DigitalOcean, Kubernetes, Terraform
* Tools: GitHub & GitLab


 Benefits
   

  

* Cutting-edge equipment (MacBook, AirPods, etc.)
* Support for learning: budget for courses, conferences, and self-development
* A multicultural and inclusive environment with regular team-building events
* A casual dress code and pet-friendly workspace
* Attractive referral program


 Our recruitment process
   

  

* Introductory Interview: Get to know each other, and discuss your experience & expectations. (Online, 30–45 min)
* Technical Interview: Dive into technical discussions and live coding task. (Online, 1.5–2h)
* Cultural Fit Interview: Explore your alignment with our values and meet the team. (On-site, 45min-1h)


 Curious about life at Centra?
   

  

 Follow us on Instagram, LinkedIn, and visit centra.com to learn more about our team, culture, and the brands we support. Explore what we’re building and how you can be part of it at centra.dev!

title: Backend Developer
description:
At Viaplay Group, we entertain millions of people every day through our streaming services, radio networks, and TV channels. We believe in the power of content not just as a way of telling stories and touching lives, but also expanding worlds.
   

  

 We’re looking for the best people to join us on our journey. Right now, we’re searching for a
 **Backend Developer** 
 in our
 **Stockholm** 
 office – are you ready to hit play on an exciting career change?
   

  

**The Role**
 As a Backend Developer at Viaplay, you’ll work on improving and developing our platform to meet the challenges of a continuously growing user base. Your contributions will directly influence how we attract and convert visitors into loyal users of our commercial streaming platform in our Engineering organization. You’ll contribute to building and refining our backend services, as well as supporting our product teams with a seamless user experience by aligning the backend and tooling.
   

  

 We’re modernizing our services to enhance scalability and performance, and you’ll play a key role in driving this transformation. With a cutting-edge serverless architecture built on Node.js, Rust and AWS, you’ll thrive in an innovative and forward-thinking tech environment.
   

  

 You’ll join a newly formed platform team that’s small but mighty, with members in Stockholm and Barcelona. Our mission? To deliver platform solutions that align with both technical and product visions, focusing on the commercial structure of our streaming service.
   

  

**Here’s What Your Daily Challenges Might Look Like**
* Take ownership of technical design, complexity assessment, development, testing, and deployment
* Collaborate with other teams transforming our platform into modern solutions
* Participate in weekly guild meetings, contributing to best practices, long-term strategy, and maintaining technical excellence
* Continuously invest in your personal growth and skill development


**What We’re Looking For**
 We understand you may feel confident ticking certain boxes more than others and that’s why we always keep an open mind in our recruitment process. But, in order to thrive in this role, we do believe you’ll have at least some experience in the following:
   

  

* Developing services using technologies such as Node.js or Rust
* Strong grasp of object-oriented programming principles
* Familiarity with test-driven or behavior-driven development (TDD/BDD) and related frameworks
* Experience developing services in cloud environments, preferably AWS
* A track record of contributing to refactoring initiatives in a dynamic organization
* Curious and motivated by collaborating with and supporting other teams


**It’s a bonus if you have:** 
  

  

* Experience building state-less, high-transactional end-user products
* Advanced knowledge of AWS services (S3, SQS, Lambda, DynamoDB, etc)


 What we offer you
   

  

* We’ve got you covered! 30 days of paid vacation every year, an attractive pension and insurance scheme, and generous parental leave pay lift.
* Your wellbeing matters. We provide you with various wellbeing initiatives including wellness allowance.
* Flexibility that works. We follow a hybrid model with three days a week in the office and the rest remote, giving you the best of collaboration and focus time.
* A safe space to grow and up-skill. Our learning culture puts you in the driver’s seat of your own development.
* An innovative environment with Hack Days once a year. This week-long initiative allows you to think outside the box and deliver creative, technical solutions that (more often than not) go on to be implemented, either in our product or our ways of working.
* Entertainment is what we love, and entertainment is what we do. So, unlimited access to Viaplay seems only fair for you to get to know the product – including serier & viewing events, new release movie rentals, linear channels and more.


**Hit play** 
**today**
 If this feels like your kind of challenge, make sure you apply by attaching your CV here – you may also want to add your LinkedIn profile. Please don’t send us your application via email because we won’t be able to accept it. We do, however, welcome any questions you may have about this particular position.
   

  

 Want to learn more about who we are and what we do? Check out our careers page or follow us on Instagram! We’re only ever a few clicks away.

title: Application Developer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and IT System Custom Software Development
description:
**5 years of experience in .NET Core, C#, Angular, TypeScript, Azure, Azure DevOps, Git, CI/CD pipelines.** 




**-Experience (+2 years) of Tailwind** 




 -Messaging & Asynchronous Systems: Kafka, Azure Service Bus, and real-time communication. Upto 9 years of working experience required.
 



 -Deep knowledge of: API and system integration, asynchronous communication, automation, and unit testing (xUnit, NUnit, etc.).
 



 -Soft skills: Excellent communication skills and proven ability to work autonomously in complex projects.
 



 -Plus: Experience from energy or finance sectors - where availability, reliability and security are of high importance

title: Developer with a Passion for Applications at StrongPoint
description:
Would you like to help create technological solutions that make a real difference in people’s everyday lives? At StrongPoint, we are on an exciting journey developing innovative products for the future of retail and e-commerce. We’re now looking for a skilled system developer to contribute to our global digital commerce solutions – and above all, someone passionate about writing high-quality code.
   

  

**About The Role**
 With us, you'll have the opportunity to work on the development of mobile applications used by store staff and customers around the world. Your work will focus on building robust, user-friendly, and secure solutions – primarily using C# and .NET.
   

  

 Together with colleagues in Täby and our teams in the Baltics, you will be involved in the entire development cycle – from concept and design to implementation and maintenance. You’ll be part of an agile team that works closely with the business, where your technical drive and problem-solving skills will truly shine.
   

  

 We highly value skilled developers – whether you specialize in mobile apps or broader backend development. What matters most to us is your dedication to code quality, curiosity, and a desire to build long-lasting solutions.
   

  

 This position is based at our office in Täby, with the possibility of hybrid work.
   

  

**Who We’re Looking For**
 You are a dedicated developer who wants to continue growing and contribute your expertise in an ambitious team. You have solid experience with C# and .NET and a desire to work on application-oriented solutions. You enjoy collaborating with others and take responsibility for finding smart technical solutions.
   

  

 We would like you to have:
   

  

* Solid experience in system development with C# and .NET
* A structured approach and good understanding of modern development methodologies
* Proficiency in Swedish and English, both spoken and written
* Relevant education in system/software development or equivalent practical experience


 It’s a plus if you have experience with:
   

  

* Mobile application development (Xamarin.Forms, .NET MAUI, or similar)
* App distribution and signing for iOS/Android
* Azure DevOps, CI/CD, and automated build pipelines
* Design and architecture patterns (e.g., MVVM, Mediator)
* Integration via RESTful APIs


**About StrongPoint**
 StrongPoint is a leading provider of retail technology and e-commerce solutions. We develop smart systems that streamline retail operations, enhance customer experiences, and shape the future of grocery shopping. With over 500 employees in more than 25 countries, we’ve helped our customers become more productive, cost-efficient, and competitive for over three decades. StrongPoint is listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange and has its headquarters in Norway.
   

  

 Learn more at: www.strongpoint.com/se/om-oss
   

  

**How do you apply?**
 In this recruitment, Strongpoint collaborates with Wise IT. To apply for the position, you simply apply via the link. If you have any questions, please contact the responsible Recruiting Consultant Kristin Mörth, at kristin.morth@wiseit.se. Unfortunately, we cannot accept applications via email as we value your personal integrity. You can read more about how we handle personal data in accordance with GDPR in the Wise Group’s policy for the processing of personal data. We work with an ongoing selection of candidates and may fill the position as soon as we find the right person. Therefore, please submit your application as soon as possible!

title: Mobile Developer - Android/iOS/Multiplatform
description:
Why This Job Is for You
   

  

 You want to be part of an engaged and collaborative team where you can deepen your expertise in software engineering, with focus on mobile apps, while continuing to grow your technical knowledge. You enjoy contributing to meaningful product development for small to big product companies, and public organizations alike.
   

  

 At DDX, part of Knightec Group, we put people at the heart of our process. We create digital products that improve everyday life — not just for today’s users, but for future generations, with a lasting impact on both people and the planet. We choose the right tech for the task - Android, iOS, or modern multiplatform frameworks like React Native and Kotlin Multiplatform. We value your curiosity and willingness to explore new technologies.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, build, and maintain digital products, primarily mobile apps for Android and/or iOS. Collaborate closely with designers and backend developers to craft seamless, user-friendly solutions.
* Work with CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous integration and high-quality delivery. Participate in architectural discussions and influence tech decisions and design patterns.
* Evaluate and implement new technologies and frameworks to enhance the development process and user experience.
* Contribute to a collaborative, knowledge-sharing culture. Help guide our clients by understanding their goals and suggesting solutions that create real value for them—and us.


**Qualifications**
* 4+ years of hands-on experience in mobile development, either native (Android/iOS) or with hybrid frameworks such as React Native, Kotlin Multiplatform, or Flutter.
* Experience with setting up and maintaining CI/CD pipelines.
* Solid understanding of architecture, technology choices, and design patterns in early-stage projects.
* Strong communication skills and a team-first mindset. Bonus if you have experience on cross-functional teamwork, with strong product focus in close collaboration with designers and product people.
* On top of apps, if you been all over the tech stack, with experience in web technologies for both frontend and backend it stands out.
* Fluent in Swedish and English, both spoken and written.


 An Exciting Journey with Knightec Group
   

  

 DDX is part of Knightec Group. Together, we form Northern Europe's leading strategic partner in product and digital service development. Combining cross-functional expertise with a holistic business understanding, we help our clients transform strategies into impactful solutions.
   

  

 Joining us means working in an environment where collaboration, creativity, and curiosity thrive. We believe that innovation happens when different perspectives meet — and we live by that every day.
   

  

 Practical Information
   

  

 This is a permanent position with a six-month probationary period. You’ll be based in our central Stockholm office, but we support hybrid and flexible work arrangements. The ideal start date is as soon as possible, or by agreement. Apply no later than 2025-08-31. If you have questions about the role, contact Mikael Westh, Talent Acquisition Specialist. Due to GDPR, we only accept applications through our career page. We’re looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Salesforce Marketing Cloud Developer
description:
Our Engagement Product Development team is growing and we are now looking for a Senior Salesforce Marketing Cloud Developer to join! Engagement at Betsson Group ensures our customers come back for more. It’s all about loyalty. We provide a world class customer experience beyond the game play featuring Tournaments, Dynamic personalized campaigns and much more!
 


**A taster of what you will be involved with** 
* Act as a consultant and technical expert on the Salesforce platform by providing support to stakeholders and users.
* Closely collaborate with experts from other areas to leverage on the Salesforce technologies through integrations with other solutions.
* Setting up new business units in SFMC that include but not limited to the configuration of the data points and FTP locations.
* Use AMP script to develop dynamic content in SFMC.
* Use SSJS to develop new custom applications in Journey Builder including leveraging the REST & SOAP APIS by creating installed packages.
* Build targeted audience segments based on email behavioral data and CRM attributes using Data Extensions and SQL Setup.
* Leveraging on the capabilities provided by Journey Builder, Automation Studio, Interaction Studio, Content Builder, Email Studio, and other solutions to deliver multi-touch communications.
* Campaigns and Triggered sends being able to oversee complex campaign workflow rules and data segmentation.
* Oversee the ETL of multiple business units that include suggesting best practices on daily automations.
* Configuring the database environment by creating the data model using data extensions and Contact Builder inside the Data Designer.
* Define data validation, cleansing, deduplication rules and processes in SFMC.
* Define data connectors for data ingestion into Salesforce across Betsson’s technical ecosystem, partnering with CRM and Data teams, as needed.
* Assist in the technical and architectural framework for the SFDC applications.
* Ensuring scalability of all the solutions developed.
* Serve as the subject matter expert for SFMC for the internal stakeholders that include managers and end-users.
* As an expert on SFMC, it is expected to gather requirements, discuss, and implement them based on best practices.
* Able to communicate technical and business solutions by developing and presenting information to multiple audiences.


**What we are looking for** 
* University degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
* Salesforce Certified Marketing Cloud Developer (or equivalent certification).
* At least 3 years of hands-on experience with Salesforce Marketing Cloud.
* Strong knowledge of Salesforce administration (minimum 1 year).
* Solid understanding of SQL, data modeling, and integration methods.
* Strong documentation and knowledge-sharing mindset.
* Ability to stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and third-party solutions.
* Excellent communication skills with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Experience with JavaScript
* Experience with Salesforce Service Cloud and Sales Cloud is a plus.


**What we offer** 

 We can offer you an environment full of ambition and passion. One day is never like the other as the only constant is change, to the better, to the greater. We strive to be the best in whatever field we choose to play on, and we make sure to have fun along the way!
 


* A friendly, open and humble working environment, where you will have the chance to work alongside with colleagues from all over the world
* A chance to evolve your skills together with your colleagues with various programs and initiatives
* Personal development through courses, in-house training and external certification



 Freedom with responsibility

title: Fullstack utvecklare till Nova Sounds
description:
På Nova Sounds möts musik och teknik i en unik kombination. Här finns möjligheten att arbeta nära kärnan i både teknik och kreativitet, driva utveckling med modern stack och sätta tydliga avtryck i ett bolag som växer snabbt och tänker långsiktigt.
 



  





 Vi söker nu en Fullstackutvecklare till Nova Sounds som vill ta ägarskap över deras tekniska plattform och leda utvecklingen av nästa generations system för musikskapare. Rollen innebär en kombination av backend-fokus i .NET/C# och fullstack-utveckling med React/Next.js och Azure. Du kommer att vara med och bygga en helt ny Creator Platform där producenter kan logga in, se sin musikkatalog, följa streams och ta del av månadsvisa royaltyrapporter.
 



  





 Detta är en högpåverkande roll med stor frihet att påverka arkitektur, teknikval och arbetssätt i ett bolag som befinner sig i en spännande tillväxtfas.
 



  





**Arbetsuppgifter:** 



* Utveckla och förvalta Nova Sounds befintliga backoffice-system för kataloghantering och royaltygenerering
* Driva nyutveckling och arkitekturbeslut med fokus på skalbarhet och prestanda
* Arbeta med backend i .NET/C# och API:er, samt frontend i React/Next.js
* Hantera integrationer mot externa musikplattformar och interna system
* Bygga och underhålla testmiljöer, CI/CD-pipelines och molnlösningar i Azure
* Samarbeta nära produkt och ledning, samt stötta och mentorera mer juniora utvecklare



  





**Vi söker dig som:** 



* Har cirka fem års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling (fullstack)
* Är stark i .NET/C#, objektorienterad programmering och API-utveckling
* Har erfarenhet av moderna frontend-ramverk, gärna React/Next.js
